summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous relevant resolutions, the General Framework Agreement for Peace in Bosnia and Herzegovina (Peace Agreement) and conclusions of Peace Implementation Conferences,
 
1. Welcomes and agrees to the designation of Mr. Miroslav Lajčák as High Representative, succeeding Mr. Christian Schwarz-Schilling, as decided by the Steering Board of the Peace Implementation Council on 19 June 2007.

2. Pays tribute to Mr. Christian Schwarz-Schilling's efforts as High Representative.

3. Reaffirms the importance of the High Representative's role in implementing the Peace Agreement and coordinating civilian organizations and agencies.

4. Reaffirms the High Representative's final authority in theatre regarding the interpretation of Annex 10 on civilian implementation.

5. Takes note of the Steering Board's decision that the Office of the High Representative will remain in place until 30 June 2008, with the aim of closure.

6. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
